description.brazilian: Marque 5 estrelas em todas as missões do Capítulo I: Off World.
description.english: Score 5 stars in every mission in Chapter I: Off World.
description.french: Obtenir un score de 5 étoiles dans toutes les missions du chapitre I : Dans l'espace.
description.german: Erreiche 5 Sterne in jeder Mission in Kapitel I: Außerweltlich.
description.italian: Segna 5 stelle in ogni missione del Capitolo I: Off World.
description.japanese: “「第I章：オフ・ワールド」のすべてのミッションで5つ星を獲得する。”
description.russian: Заработайте 5 звезд в каждой миссии в главе I: Внеземной мир.
description.schinese: 在《第一章：地球之外》的每个任务中获得5颗星。
description.spanish: ¡Obtén 5 estrellas en cada misión del Capítulo I: Fuera del Mundo.
description.tchinese: “在《第一章：地球之外》的每個任務中獲得5顆星。”

description.brazilian: Marque 5 estrelas em todas as missões do Capítulo II: Segredos.
description.english: Score 5 stars in every mission in Chapter II: Secrets.
description.french: Obtenir un score de 5 étoiles dans toutes les missions du chapitre II : Secrets.
description.german: Erreiche 5 Sterne in jeder Mission in Kapitel II: Geheimnisse.
description.italian: Segna 5 stelle in ogni missione del Capitolo II: Segreti.
description.japanese: “「第II章：秘密」のすべてのミッションで5つ星を獲得する。”
description.russian: Заработайте 5 звезд в каждой миссии в главе II: Секреты.
description.schinese: 在《第二章：秘密》的每个任务中获得5颗星。
description.spanish: ¡Obtén 5 estrellas en cada misión del Capítulo II: Secretos!
description.tchinese: “在《第二章：秘密》的每個任務中獲得5顆星。”

description.brazilian: Obtenha 5 estrelas em todas as missões do Capítulo III: A Nave-Mãe.
description.english: Score 5 stars in every mission in Chapter III: The Mothership.
description.french: Obtenir un score de 5 étoiles dans toutes les missions du chapitre III : Le vaisseau-mère.
description.german: Erreiche 5 Sterne in jeder Mission in Kapitel II: Das Mutterschiff.
description.italian: Segna 5 stelle in ogni missione del Capitolo III: La Nave Madre.
description.japanese: “「第III章：母艦」のすべてのミッションで5つ星を獲得する。”
description.koreana: 모더쉽 챕터 III의 모든 미션에서 5성을 획득하세요.
description.russian: Заработайте 5 звезд в каждой миссии в Главе III: Материнский корабль.
description.schinese: 在《第三章：母舰》的每个任务中获得5颗星。
description.spanish: ¡Obtén 5 estrellas en cada misión del Capítulo III: La Nave Nodriza!
description.tchinese: “在《第三章：母艦》的每個任務中獲得5顆星。”

description.brazilian: Vencer uma missão de desafio.
description.english: Win a Challenge mission.
description.french: Remporter une mission de défi.
description.italian: Vinci una missione sfida.
description.japanese: “チャレンジミッションに勝つ。”
description.schinese: 赢得一项挑战任务。
description.spanish: Gana una misión de desafío.

description.brazilian: Derrote o Gerente Geral Cerebro Blobbius.
description.english: Defeat General Manager Cerebro Blobbius.
description.french: Vaincre le président-directeur général Cérébro Blobbius.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Direttore Generale Blobbius.
description.japanese: “脳怪総経理ブロビウスを倒す。”
description.schinese: 击败脑怪总经理布洛比乌斯。
description.spanish: Derrota al Gerente General Cerebro Blobbius.
description.tchinese: “擊敗腦怪總經理布洛比烏斯。”

description.brazilian: Derrote a Gerente de Recursos Cerebrais Minda Thoughtsson.
description.english: Defeat Brain Resources Manager Minda Thoughtsson.
description.french: Vaincre la gestionnaire des ressources neuronales Minda Refleckson.
description.german: Besiege Brain Resources Manager Minda Thoughtsson.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Responsabile delle Risorse Umane Minda Thoughtsson.
description.japanese: “脳的資源マネジャーのミンダ・ソートソンを倒す。”
description.koreana: 뇌 자원 관리자 마인다 소너슨을 물리치세요.
description.russian: Победить менеджера по управлению ресурсами мозга Минду Тотссон.
description.schinese: 击败脑力资源经理明达·思索
description.spanish: Derrota a la Gerente de Recursos Cerebrales Minda Thoughtsson.
description.tchinese: “擊敗腦力資源經理明達·思索。”

description.brazilian: Derrote Biggus Brainius Maximus Jr., PhD.
description.english: Defeat Biggus Brainius Maximus Jr., PhD.
description.french: Vaincre Dr Biggus Bulbus Rachidius Jr.
description.german: Besiege Dr. Biggus Brainius Maximus Jr.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Biggus Brainius Maximus Jr., PhD.
description.japanese: “マキシマス博士·脳王二世を倒す。”
description.koreana: 빅거스 브레이니우스 막시무스 주니어 박사를 물리치세요.
description.russian: Победите Биггуса Брейниуса Максимуса мл., доктора философии.
description.schinese: 击败马克西姆斯·脑王二世·博士。
description.spanish: Derrota a Biggus Brainius Maximus Jr., PhD.
description.tchinese: “擊敗馬克西姆斯·腦王二世·博士。”

description.brazilian: Complete todos os feitos.
description.english: Complete all achievements.
description.french: Terminer tous les succès.
description.italian: Completa tutti gli obiettivi.
description.japanese: “全実績を達成する。”
description.schinese: 完成所有成就。
description.spanish: Completa todos los logros.

description.brazilian: Vença todas as missões de desafio.
description.english: Win all Challenge missions.
description.french: Remporter toutes les missions de défi.
description.italian: Vinci tutte le missioni sfida.
description.japanese: “すべてのチャレンジミッションに勝つ。”
description.schinese: 赢得所有挑战任务。
description.spanish: ¡Gana todas las misiones de desafío!

description.brazilian: Colete todas as histórias em quadrinhos.
description.english: Collect all comic books.
description.french: Collectionner toutes les BD du jeu.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i fumetti.
description.japanese: “すべてのコミックブックを集める。”
description.schinese: 收集所有漫画书。
description.spanish: ¡Colecciona todos los cómics!

description.brazilian: Recolha todos os cartões de informação.
description.english: Collect all info cards.
description.french: Collectionner toutes les infocartes du jeu.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le schede informative.
description.japanese: “すべての情報カードを集める。”
description.schinese: 收集所有信息卡片。
description.spanish: ¡Recolecta todas las tarjetas de información!

description.brazilian: Crie todos os Mods do QG.
description.english: Craft all HQ Mods.
description.french: Fabriquer tous les mods de QG du jeu.
description.italian: Crea tutti i Mod Sede centrale.
description.japanese: “すべての本部モッドを作る。”
description.schinese: 制作所有总部模组。
description.spanish: ¡Crea todos los Mod CG!

description.brazilian: Crie todas as armas.
description.english: Craft all weapons.
description.french: Fabriquer toutes les armes du jeu.
description.italian: Crea tutte le armi.
description.japanese: “すべての武器を作る。”
description.schinese: 制作所有武器。
description.spanish: ¡Crea todas las armas!

description.brazilian: Encontre e colete uma revista em quadrinhos.
description.english: Find and collect a comic book.
description.french: Trouver une BD et l'ajouter à votre collection.
description.german: Finde einen Comic und füge ihn deiner Sammlung hinzu.
description.italian: Trova e raccogli un fumetto.
description.japanese: “コミックを探して集める。”
description.schinese: 寻找并收集一本漫画书。
description.spanish: Encuentra y recoge un cómic.

description.brazilian: Encontre e colete um cartão de informações.
description.english: Find and collect an info card.
description.french: Trouver une infocarte et l'ajouter à votre collection.
description.german: Finde eine Infokarte und füge sie deiner Sammlung hinzu.
description.italian: Trova e raccogli una scheda informativa.
description.japanese: “情報カードを探して集める。”
description.schinese: 寻找并收集一张信息卡片。
description.spanish: Encuentra y recoge una tarjeta de información.

description.brazilian: Crie um Mod de QG.
description.english: Craft an HQ Mod.
description.french: Fabriquer un mod de QG.
description.italian: Crea un Mod Sede centrale.
description.japanese: “本部モッドを作る。”
description.schinese: 制作一个总部模组。
description.spanish: ¡Crea un Mod CG!

description.brazilian: Crie uma arma.
description.english: Craft a weapon.
description.french: Fabriquer une arme.
description.italian: Crea un'arma.
description.japanese: “武器を作る。”
description.schinese: 制作一个武器。
description.spanish: ¡Crea un arma!

description.brazilian: Destrua 30 lacaios inimigos.
description.english: Destroy 30 enemy minions.
description.french: Éliminer 30 ennemis.
description.italian: Distruggi 30 scagnozzi nemici.
description.japanese: “敵のミニオンを30体破壊する。”
description.schinese: 消灭30个敌方小兵。
description.spanish: Destruye 30 súbditos enemigos.

description.brazilian: Destrua 200 lacaios inimigos.
description.english: Destroy 200 enemy minions.
description.french: Éliminer 200 ennemis.
description.italian: Distruggi 200 scagnozzi nemici.
description.japanese: “敵のミニオンを200体破壊する。”
description.schinese: 消灭200个敌方小兵。
description.spanish: Destruye 200 súbditos enemigos.

description.brazilian: Esmague 50 cérebros
description.english: Squash 50 brains
description.french: Écraser 50 cerveaux.
description.italian: Schiaccia 50 cervelli
description.japanese: “脳を50個潰す！”
description.schinese: 踩爆50个大脑
description.spanish: ¡Aplastar 50 cerebros!

description.brazilian: Cair em águas profundas.
description.english: Fall in deep water.
description.french: Tomber dans les eaux profondes.
description.italian: Cadere in acqua profonda.
description.japanese: “深い水に落ちる。”
description.schinese: 落入深水中。
description.spanish: ¡Caer en agua profunda!

description.brazilian: Hackeie todos os tipos de Replikon.
description.english: Hack every type of Replikon.
description.french: Pirater au moins un réplikon de chaque type.
description.italian: Hackerare ogni tipo di Replikon.
description.japanese: “すべての種類の複製装置をハッキングする。”
description.schinese: 破解全部类型的复制装置。
description.spanish: ¡Hackea todo tipo de Replikon!

description.brazilian: Destrua 50 lacaios inimigos com um Pulso Terrestre.
description.english: Destroy 50 enemy minions with a Ground Pound.
description.french: Éliminer 50 ennemis en les fracassant avec la turbocombinaison.
description.italian: Distruggi 50 scagnozzi nemici con un Pugno a terra.
description.japanese: “地面パウンドで敵のミニオンを50体破壊する。”
description.russian: Уничтожьте 50 вражеских миньонов с помощью удара по земле.
description.schinese: 用地面猛击消灭50个敌方小兵。
description.spanish: Destruye 50 súbditos enemigos con un Golpe de Tierra.
description.tchinese: “用地面猛擊消滅50個敵方小兵。”

description.brazilian: Destrua 50 lacaios inimigos com um Atropelamento de Bicicleta.
description.english: Destroy 50 enemy minions with a Bike Ram.
description.french: Éliminer 50 ennemis en fonçant dedans avec l'hoverbike.
description.italian: Distruggi 50 scagnozzi nemici con un urto in bicicletta.
description.japanese: “バイクラムで敵のミニオンを50体破壊する。”
description.russian: Уничтожьте 50 вражеских миньонов с помощью удара на велосипеде.
description.schinese: 摩托车冲撞消灭50个敌方小兵。
description.spanish: Destruye 50 súbditos enemigos con un embiste de bicicleta.
description.tchinese: “用摩托車衝撞消滅50個敵方小兵。”

description.brazilian: Complete uma missão em menos de 10 minutos.
description.english: Complete a mission in under 10 minutes.
description.french: Terminer une mission en moins de 10 minutes.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission in unter 10 Minuten ab.
description.italian: Completa una missione in meno di 10 minuti.
description.japanese: “10分以内にミッションをクリアする。”
description.russian: Завершите миссию менее чем за 10 минут.
description.schinese: 在10分钟内通关一个任务
description.spanish: ¡Completa una misión en menos de 10 minutos!

description.brazilian: Destrua 1000 lacaios inimigos.
description.english: Destroy 1000 enemy minions.
description.french: Éliminer 1 000 ennemis.
description.italian: Distruggi 1000 scagnozzi nemici.
description.japanese: “敵のミニオンを1000体破壊する。”
description.schinese: 消灭1000个敌方小兵。
description.spanish: Destruye 1000 súbditos enemigos.

description.brazilian: Complete uma missão sem receber nenhum dano.
description.english: Complete a mission without taking any damage.
description.french: Terminer une mission sans subir le moindre dégât.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.italian: Completa una missione senza subire danni.
description.japanese: “一切のダメージを受けずにミッションをクリアする。”
description.schinese: 在不受到任何伤害的情况下通关任务。
description.spanish: ¡Completa una misión sin recibir ningún daño!
description.tchinese: “在不受到任何傷害的情況下通關任務。”

description.brazilian: Conecte 9 postes X-Fence.
description.english: Connect 9 X-Fence posts.
description.french: Connecter 9 piquets de barrière.
description.italian: Collega 9 post X-Recinzione.
description.japanese: “X型フェンスを9つ接続する。”
description.schinese: 连接9个X型围栏。
description.spanish: Conecta 9 postes X-Valla.

description.brazilian: Complete uma missão deixando pelo menos 1 Replikon não hackeado.
description.english: Complete a mission leaving at least 1 Replikon un-hacked.
description.french: Terminer une mission sans avoir piraté tous les réplikons.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, bei der mindestens 1 Replikon nicht gehackt wurde.
description.italian: Completa una missione lasciando almeno 1 Replikon non hackerato.
description.japanese: “少なくとも1つの複製装置をハッキングされないままミッションをクリアする。”
description.koreana: 미션을 완료하되 적어도 1개의 레플리콘을 해킹하지 않은 채로 남겨두세요.
description.russian: Завершите миссию, оставив как минимум 1 непрохаканный Репликон.
description.schinese: 在至少留存1个复制装置未被破解的情况下通关任务。
description.spanish: Completa una misión dejando al menos 1 Replikon sin hackear.
description.tchinese: “在至少留存1個複製裝置未被破解的情況下通關任務。”

description.brazilian: Sobremarche 30 lacaios e/ou construções em uma única missão.
description.english: Overdrive 30 minions and/or buildings in a single mission.
description.french: Surcharger 30 robots et/ou structures en une mission.
description.german: Übertakte in einer Mission 30 Truppen und/oder Gebäude.
description.italian: Sovraccarica 30 scagnozzi e/o edifici in una singola missione.
description.japanese: “1つのミッションで30体のミニオンや建物をオーバードライブする。”
description.koreana: 한 번의 미션에서 미니언이나 건물을 30개 이상 오버드라이브하세요.
description.russian: Перегрузьте 30 миньонов и/или зданий в одном задании.
description.schinese: 在一个任务中超载30个小兵或建筑。
description.spanish: Sobrecarga a 30 esbirros y/o edificios en una sola misión.
description.tchinese: “在一個任務中超載30個小兵或建築。”

description.brazilian: Derrote Blobbius sem derrubar sua estação de cura.
description.english: Defeat Blobbius without taking down his Healing station.
description.french: Vaincre Blobbius sans détruire sa station de soin.
description.german: Besiege Blobbius, ohne seine Heilungsstation auszuschalten.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Blobbius senza distruggere la sua stazione di guarigione.
description.japanese: “回復ステーションを壊さずにブロビウスを倒す。”
description.koreana: 힐링 스테이션을 파괴하지 않고 Blobbius를 물리치세요.
description.russian: Победите Блоббиуса, не разрушив его центр исцеления.
description.schinese: 在不破坏治疗站的情况下击败布洛比乌斯。
description.spanish: Derrota a Blobbius sin derribar su estación de curación.
description.tchinese: “在不破壞治療站的情況下擊敗布洛比烏斯。”

description.brazilian: Derrote Minda com seu QG com 100% de Vida.
description.english: Defeat Minda with your HQ at 100% Health.
description.french: Vaincre Minda en gardant votre QG à 100 % de points de vie.
description.german: Besiege Minda, während dein Hauptquartier 100% Gesundheit hat.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Minda con la tua sede centrale al 100% di salute.
description.japanese: “本部の体力が100％の状態でミンダを倒す。”
description.russian: Победите Минду, имея Штаб на 100% здоровья.
description.schinese: 在总部生命值100%的情况下击败明达。
description.spanish: Derrota a Minda con tu Cuartel General al 100% de salud.
description.tchinese: “在總部生命值100%的情況下擊敗明達。”

description.brazilian: Derrote Big B ativando no máximo uma única Baliza de Zelador.
description.english: Defeat Big B by activating no more than a single Janitor Beacon.
description.french: Vaincre Big B sans activer plus d'une balise de nettoyeurs.
description.german: Besiege Big B und aktiviere dabei nicht mehr als ein Hausmeister-Leuchtsignal.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Big B attivando non più di un solo Segnale del Custode.
description.japanese: “掃除屋ビーコンを1つ以上起動させずにビッグBを倒す。”
description.koreana: 하나의 청소부 신호기를 활성화하여 빅 B를 물리치세요.
description.russian: Победите Большого В, активировав не более одного маяка уборщика.
description.schinese: 在激活不超过1个清洁工信标的情况下击败大B。
description.spanish: Derrota a Big B activando no más de una baliza de conserje.
description.tchinese: “在啟動不超過1個清潔工信標的情況下擊敗大B。”

description.brazilian: Complete uma missão sem usar a Vista de comando.
description.english: Complete a mission without using Command View.
description.french: Terminer une mission sans utiliser la vue de commandement.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, ohne die Kommandoansicht zu benutzen.
description.italian: Completa una missione senza utilizzare Vista Comandi.
description.japanese: “指揮視点を使用せずにミッションをクリアする。”
description.koreana: Command View를 사용하지 않고 미션을 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Выполните миссию, не используя Вид командования.
description.schinese: 在不使用指挥视角的情况下通关任务。
description.spanish: ¡Completa una misión sin usar la Vista de Comandos!
description.tchinese: “在不使用指揮視角的情況下通關任務。”

description.brazilian: Repare 30 lacaios e/ou construções em uma única missão.
description.english: Repair 30 minions and/or buildings in a single mission.
description.french: Réparer 30 robots et/ou structures en une mission.
description.german: Repariere in einer Mission 30 Truppen und/oder Gebäude.
description.italian: Ripara 30 scagnozzi e/o edifici in una singola missione.
description.japanese: “1つのミッションで30体のミニオンや建物を修理する。”
description.koreana: 한 번의 미션에서 하수인 및/또는 건물 30개를 수리하세요.
description.russian: Отремонтировать 30 прислужников и/или зданий за одну миссию.
description.schinese: 在一个任务中修复30个小兵或建筑。
description.spanish: Repara 30 esbirros y/o edificios en una sola misión.
description.tchinese: “在一個任務中修復30個小兵或建築。”

description.brazilian: Complete uma missão sem perder nenhum(a) Zelador(a).
description.english: Complete a mission without losing a single Janitor.
description.french: Terminer une mission sans perdre un seul nettoyeur.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, ohne einen Hausmeister zu verlieren.
description.italian: Completa una missione senza perdere neanche un Custode.
description.japanese: “掃除屋を一人も失うことなくミッションをクリアする。”
description.koreana: 청소부 한 명도 잃지 않고 미션을 완수하십시오.
description.russian: Выполните миссию, не потеряв ни одного уборщика.
description.schinese: 在不损失1名清洁工的情况下通关任务。
description.spanish: ¡Completa una misión sin perder ni un solo conserje!
description.tchinese: “在不損失1名清潔工的情況下通關任務。”

description.brazilian: Complete uma missão sem causar nenhum dano de Combate Corpo a Corpo.
description.english: Complete a mission without dealing any Melee damage.
description.french: Terminer une mission sans avoir infligé de dégâts au corps-à-corps.
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, ohne Nahkampfschaden auszuteilen.
description.italian: Completa una missione senza infliggere danni da mischia.
description.japanese: “近接攻撃によるダメージを与えずにミッションをクリアする。”
description.koreana: 근접 피해를 입히지 않고 미션을 완료하세요.
description.russian: Выполните миссию, не нанося урона в ближнем бою.
description.schinese: 在不造成任何近战伤害的情况下通关任务。
description.spanish: ¡Completa una misión sin infligir ningún daño cuerpo a cuerpo!
description.tchinese: “在不造成任何近戰傷害的情況下通關任務。”
